resource_dependency.frontend_api_client: Axios-based API client configured to communicate with backend endpoints.
resource_dependency.backend_db_connection: PostgreSQL connection using environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp

function: Fetch dynamic data from backend APIs for use across the frontend application.
static_description: The frontend displays loading indicators while fetching data such as user profile information, available bookings, reimbursements, and settlement reports.

interaction_and_states.description: On page load, the frontend makes authenticated requests to backend endpoints to retrieve relevant data based on the current route or context.

resource_dependency.database_schema_definitions: Database schema definitions for users, roles, permissions, bookings, expenses, receipts, policies, settlements, payments, etc.

function: Establish a secure connection to a PostgreSQL database using predefined environment variables and support CRUD operations for all entities involved in travel reimbursement and payment workflows.
static_description: Backend initializes a database connection pool upon startup using provided credentials and exposes ORM models representing business entities.

resource_dependency.auth_token_storage: JWT tokens stored securely in HTTP-only cookies or localStorage depending on security configuration.
resource_dependency.user_role_permissions: Role-based access control table mapping roles (employee, admin, finance) to accessible routes and actions.

function: Provide login/logout functionality and manage session state along with role-based access control for different parts of the system.
static_description: Login screen with email and password fields, submit button, and optional links for password recovery or registration. Background is white with navy-colored buttons and inputs.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Login' submits credentials via POST /api/auth/login. On success, redirects to dashboard; otherwise shows error message.
Submitting invalid credentials results in inline validation errors displayed under respective input fields.

resource_dependency.flight_search_api: External flight search API returning real-time availability and pricing data.
resource_dependency.booking_confirmation_template: Template for displaying confirmed booking summary including flight number, departure time, seat info, and total cost.
resource_dependency.airline_logo_assets: Directory path containing airline logo images used in display listings.

function: Allow employees to search for flights, compare options, and confirm their selections.
static_description: Flight booking interface showing search form at top (origin, destination, dates), followed by a list of filtered flight results displayed in cards with price, duration, stops, and airline logos. Selected flight shows expanded details before confirmation.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Search Flights' triggers query to external API using selected filters. Results populate dynamically below the form.
Selecting a flight card expands additional information like baggage allowance, meal options, and seat selection preview.
Clicking 'Confirm Booking' sends selected flight details to backend which stores the booking record and returns confirmation page.

resource_dependency.hotel_search_api: API endpoint providing hotel inventory including room types, prices, amenities, photos, and location data.
resource_dependency.reservation_summary_modal: Modal window presenting selected hotel name, check-in/out dates, room type, rate plan, cancellation policy, and total amount due.

function: Enable searching for hotels, applying filters, and reserving rooms.
static_description: Hotel booking page features a filter sidebar on left and main area showing grid of hotel cards with image thumbnails, ratings, short descriptions, and starting rates. Each card includes quick-view option and reserve button.

interaction_and_states.description: Adjusting any filter criteria updates the displayed list of hotels instantly without full reload.
Clicking 'Reserve' opens modal summarizing reservation details. Clicking 'Confirm Reservation' creates booking entry in database and redirects to payment flow.

resource_dependency.train_schedule_api: API offering train schedules, seat availability, class types, and fare structures.
resource_dependency.seat_map_visualization: Interactive SVG element allowing users to choose preferred seats when applicable.
resource_dependency.ticket_purchase_confirmation: Confirmation screen detailing journey specifics, boarding point, coach/class, and e-ticket download link.

function: Display train schedules and allow users to purchase tickets directly through the platform.
static_description: Train booking interface consists of a schedule lookup section (source, destination, date), timetable listing matching trains with departure times, arrival estimates, duration, and available classes. Train rows can be clicked for more details.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a train row expands detailed view showing intermediate stations, live delay status, and class-specific fares.
Clicking 'Book Now' navigates to passenger details and seat selection screen. After completion, generates ticket confirmation with downloadable PDF.

resource_dependency.settlement_report_template: Predefined HTML/PDF template outlining categorized expenses, associated bookings, reimbursed amounts, and net balances per employee or period.
resource_dependency.report_generation_endpoint: Backend endpoint /api/reports/settlements that accepts parameters like date range, department, and export format.

function: Generate comprehensive settlement reports aggregating travel expenses against approved budgets and processed reimbursements.
static_description: Settlements report generator presents a dashboard with filters for selecting reporting period, department/team, and export format (CSV, Excel, PDF). Generated reports appear in a downloadable table format.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Generate Settlement Report' calls backend endpoint with filter parameters and renders result either inline or provides file download link.

resource_dependency.document_upload_handler: File uploader supporting image and PDF formats with size limits and automatic thumbnail generation.
resource_dependency.submission_success_page: Success confirmation page with reference ID, next steps, and option to track progress later.

function: Allow users to submit reimbursement claims with attached documentation and categorized expense entries.
static_description: Reimbursement form includes multiple sections for adding individual expense items, uploading receipts, entering justification notes, and reviewing submitted claim before final submission. All containers have white background with navy borders/buttons.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking '+ Add Another Expense' appends new line item field group to the form for additional entries.
Dragging or browsing for files initiates upload process and displays thumbnail previews alongside corresponding expense lines.
Clicking 'Submit Reimbursement Request' validates all required fields, uploads documents, and posts data to backend for approval workflow initiation.

resource_dependency.status_timeline_component: Timeline visualization indicating stages of reimbursement processing (submitted, reviewed, approved, paid).
resource_dependency.status_update_notifications: Push notifications or banner alerts informing users about changes in reimbursement statuses.

function: Provide visibility into reimbursement request lifecycle with clear indication of current stage and expected resolution timeline.
static_description: Dashboard view lists recent reimbursement submissions with status badges (Pending, Under Review, Approved, Paid) and clickable rows leading to detailed status pages. White container backgrounds with navy headers.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a reimbursement row navigates to dedicated status page showing timeline, comments from reviewers, and uploaded documents.

resource_dependency.admin_navigation_menu: Sidebar menu listing administrative modules like Manage Bookings, Process Reimbursements, User Management.
resource_dependency.approval_workflow_controls: Buttons for Approve, Reject, Request Changes, and Comment actions within reimbursement detail views.
resource_dependency.bulk_action_toolbar: Toolbar enabling mass operations on selected bookings or reimbursement records (e.g., approve multiple requests).

function: Offer tools for administrators to oversee travel arrangements, evaluate reimbursement claims, and perform managerial tasks efficiently.
static_description: Admin panel features a responsive layout with collapsible side navigation and central working area displaying tabular data grids for bookings and reimbursements. Containers are styled with white backgrounds and navy accents.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Approve' updates reimbursement status in backend, logs decision timestamp, and notifies requester via system notification or email.
Selecting a booking allows editing key fields like traveler name, itinerary dates, and accommodation preferences. Changes saved back to database immediately.

resource_dependency.payment_gateway_integration: Integration with third-party payment processor supporting major credit cards, bank transfers, and corporate accounts.
resource_dependency.transaction_logging_schema: Schema for recording transaction IDs, amounts, timestamps, statuses, and related booking/reimbursement identifiers.
resource_dependency.secure_checkout_flow: PCI-compliant checkout form collecting minimal necessary billing information and securely transmitting it to payment provider.

function: Handle financial transactions for travel purchases and reimbursements ensuring secure, auditable exchanges.
static_description: Checkout screens follow standard multi-step pattern: cart review → payment method selection → secure form entry → confirmation. Visual styling uses white backgrounds and navy call-to-action buttons throughout.

interaction_and_states.description: After filling out payment details, clicking 'Pay Now' encrypts sensitive data and forwards it to payment gateway. Upon successful charge, updates booking/payment status accordingly.

resource_dependency.receipt_management_interface: Interface for viewing, tagging, deleting, and associating uploaded receipts with specific expense entries.
resource_dependency.ocr_receipt_scanner: Optional OCR service integration to extract line-item data from scanned receipts automatically.

function: Organize travel-related expenditures into logical categories and maintain digital copies of supporting documentation.
static_description: Receipt management screen displays uploaded files in a gallery-style grid with category tags overlaid. Users can click to zoom, edit metadata, or delete unwanted scans. Categorized expenses listed in sortable tables.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a receipt allows assignment of an appropriate expense category and linking to one or more reimbursement line items.
Selecting 'Delete' prompts confirmation dialog and removes both file and database references permanently after confirmation.

resource_dependency.policy_validation_rules_engine: Logic engine evaluating proposed bookings or reimbursement claims against company-defined spending limits, eligible vendors, and pre-approved categories.
resource_dependency.violation_alert_banner: Banner-style alert shown prominently during booking or reimbursement submission when violations occur.
resource_dependency.policy_override_request_flow: Workflow enabling users to seek manual approvals for exceptions exceeding policy constraints.

function: Enforce organizational travel policies during booking creation and reimbursement processing phases to prevent unauthorized spending.
static_description: Policy compliance checks occur silently behind the scenes but surface violation warnings near relevant input areas (e.g., over-limit hotel costs trigger inline notice). Override requests prompt explanatory note fields.

interaction_and_states.description: If user selects a hotel exceeding budget cap, an alert appears explaining the discrepancy and suggesting alternatives or override pathway.
Clicking 'Request Exception' opens modal asking for reason justification and manager contact info before routing exception for review.

resource_dependency.finance_dashboard_layout: Dashboard presenting charts, summaries, and drill-down tables covering monthly spend trends, departmental allocations, pending approvals, and settled reimbursements.
resource_dependency.export_controls: Options for exporting raw datasets or rendered visualizations in common formats (PDF, PNG, CSV).
resource_dependency.filter_presets: Saved views for frequently accessed reports like quarterly summaries, team comparisons, or vendor performance analytics.

function: Deliver actionable insights to finance teams regarding travel spending patterns, outstanding obligations, and reconciliation readiness.
static_description: Finance reporting dashboard uses white-background panels containing navy-tinted graphs, KPI boxes, and interactive tables. Sidebar contains quick-access filters and preset report selections.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking segments of pie/bar charts filters underlying data tables to show only related subsets for deeper investigation.
Applying custom filters then clicking 'Save View' adds a bookmarked report configuration to personal dashboard shortcuts.

resource_dependency.responsive_css_framework: Tailwind CSS or Bootstrap framework enforcing consistent mobile-first responsiveness and color palette adherence.
resource_dependency.color_palette_definition: #FFFFFF for container backgrounds, #001F54 for primary component colors (buttons, headings, icons)
resource_dependency.breakpoint_media_queries: CSS media queries targeting desktop (>1024px), tablet (768px–1023px), and mobile (<768px) viewports.

function: Ensure consistent look-and-feel across devices with adaptive layouts optimized for various screen sizes and orientations.
static_description: All UI components utilize a unified design language featuring clean white container surfaces contrasted by bold navy accents on buttons, headers, and interactive elements. Layout adjusts fluidly between breakpoints.

interaction_and_states.description: As viewport width decreases, navigation menus collapse into hamburger icons, forms stack vertically, and spacing adjusts to preserve readability and usability.
